String.string: I'll pay you. This deal will be good for both of us.
Humpf, I swear this is the best I can do.

Eliminate bastion mystics, sorcerers, reapers, lancers, slayers, and priests in the Bastion of Lok, and collect darkness tokens. [You must select Bastion of Lok (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:253#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Deliver the darkness tokens to Ehringer at the entrance of the Bastion of Lok.
